heading: rants and raves
subheading: date: fri, 17 dec 1999 13:08:08 -0600 from: “melanie pierce” (melaniep@debner.com) to: newsfeedback@wired.com subject: mahir: live and in the flesh with regard to “mahir, live and in the flesh,” 16.dec.1999. i’m sorry. do people not have anything better to do with their time? thisman is being seen all across the world in magazines and on […]
author: wired blogs
text: date: fri, 17 dec 1999 13:08:08 -0600 from: "melanie pierce" (melaniep@debner.com)to: newsfeedback@wired.comsubject: mahir: live and in the fleshwith regard to "mahir, live and in the flesh," 16.dec.1999.i'm sorry. do people not have anything better to do with their time? thisman is being seen all across the world in magazines and on talk shows! heis an everyday person with a web site trying to get women! people areinsane! i am just floored by all the publicity that this man is getting andall the attention people are giving him.what is that oldsaying.........get a life!
